content:
Hey folks -- so I've created this new fangled github project board that tracks active lang team initiatives:

https://github.com/orgs/rust-lang/projects/16/views/1

I believe it has everything, including some things that may not be so active. Note that you can do all kinds of interesting views, too, and where applicable it links to people's repositories. I'm going to update the lang-team.rust-lang.org to point at that and also to explain how the labels and things are meant to be, but I'd love if people would cast an eye and note anything that's missing!

Also, we have a planning meeting tomorrow -- if anyone wants to open up a design meeting proposal or to leave notes for review, now's the time! Please leave them on the tracking issue above :point_up:
